Title: The Leisure Seeker
Writer: Michael Zadoorian (novel), Stephen Amidon (screenplay), Francesca Archibugi (screenplay), Francesco Piccolo (screenplay), Paolo Virzì (screenplay)
Actors: Helen Mirren, Donald Sutherland, Christian McKay, Janel Moloney
Plot: A runaway couple go on an unforgettable journey in the faithful old RV they call The Leisure Seeker.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
